entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
